# wordle

<!-- badges: start -->
<!-- badges: end -->

The goal of wordle is to help me learn R package development workflows in the context of the word game taking the world by storm.

## Installation

You can install the development version of wordle from [GitHub](https://github.com/) with:

``` r
# install.packages("devtools")
devtools::install_github("robe2037/wordle")
```
